title: S13 Ep35: Black Eyed Kids and The Haunting of Sweet Springs
itunes:title: Black Eyed Kids and The Haunting of Sweet Springs
description:
David Weatherly returns to Beyond The Darkness to talk about the revised edition of his Black Eyed Children book and give an update on Brian Bethel 20 years after his encounter. Then, David talks about the haunting of Sweet Springs, a historic location in West Virginia that has hosted many historical dignitaries, served as a tuberculosis hospital, and had a mysterious Native American past!

PLUSL A CHILLING new encounter with the Black Eyed Kids in Theater of the Mind!

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

Check out David here: http://twocrowsparanormal.blogspot.com/

www.truecar.com
